TopicTitle: Consilgio Explorations - A Career Mode Adventure

Articles.Content:
Consiglio Explorations - The Adventure returns

This symbol may be harmless to you, but be warned, across the multiverse it shakes the hearts of many. Many survivors have learnt to cry at the sight of this symbol, knowing the end to them as came. It is a symbol of anarchy, of destruction, of intelligence... It is the symbol of Consiglio Devastations... Consiglio Devastations are not your typical group of somewhat crazy mad scientists, for they have order inside of them. Of course their members vary, from a sand loving madman of a krakenist (*COUGH* *COUGH* yours truly.), a computer youtube-techie wannabe who helps with all software. To the main man himself, Dave Consiglio, who has destroyed arguably more planets than the entire company combined. These guys are a force to reckon with, living on the secluded world of Newpiter (a terraformed Jupiter.)...

But, in the spender of the multiverse, and also the ultraverse. Comes the fact that more than infinite realities exist... And infinite realities gives infinite probabilities... This story will set in one universe, a universe where this force did not form into destructive capabilities, but into the thoughts of adventure. Of the fact that there is something OUT there... But that's not the only thing that is different. Those of Consiglio Devastation, known as Consiglio Explorations in this universe, are not human in origin. Humanity in fact does not exist, instead in the place of Earth comes a much smaller world, 10x smaller to be in-fact, but somehow has remained having 1g on its surface. This world, called kerbin by its locals, is inhabited by a race known as Kerbals. These kerbals seek for adventure, and in the story that soon will start, the adventure is received by their race...

However... The kerbals are not along in this adventure...
